title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of offences (in 1,000s), with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Number of offences (in 1,000s) has increased over the Year
Number of offences (in 1,000s) is slightly constant from 2010/11 to 2015/16, slightly increasing from 2015/16 to 2016/17, and lastly slightly constant from 2016/17 to 2018/19.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
Max Number of offences (in 1,000s) about 14.84 was recorded at Year 2018/19
Min Number of offences (in 1,000s) about 9.69 was recorded at Year 2014/15
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of offences (in 1,000s), with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014/15 to 2018/19.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2010/11 to 2014/15.
